entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
